page.title: 06CROSSFORD VILLAGE
page.content: Crossford is a rapidly expanding dormitory settlement just 2 miles to the west of Dunfermline on the main Dunfermline to Kincardine Bridge Road. Growth has been rapid in the last 20 years, the population increasing by more than 3 times as new housing estates have been built. Being so near to Dunfermline, the village has less facilities than might be expected for a place of its size, but community feeling is still quite strong, and the village Gala, held each June, together with a village newsletter (see page 12) help to promote this feeling. Few of the residents work in the village itself, the only sources of employment being in the few small shops,(a post office, general store, cafe, butchers, hairdressers and antique shop) the two 3 star hotels, the school, or on surrounding farms.
